roles_info_text: ğŸ‘‘ Role Hierarchy and Permissions: Owner: - Full access to all functions. - Can appoint/dismiss any roles, including other Owners. - Access to the server terminal. - Cannot be blocked or modified by others. Co-Owner: - Full access like an Owner, except for appointing Owner and Co-Owner roles. - Access to the server terminal. Senior Admin: - Can manage users (blocking, balance). - Can manage containers (issuing, changing time). - Can manage roles below their own (Admin and lower). - Can approve/decline deposit and withdrawal requests. Admin: - Can manage non-administrator users. - Can view the list of all containers and manage them. - Cannot change the roles of other users. Junior Admin: - Can use the /rinfo command in the support chat to view user information. - No other administrative rights. Participant: - Standard user with no administrative rights.
